summary:
LIGHTNING TALKS: Sept. 04, 2013

The annual tradition of lightning talks has captivated the Django world.

A lightning talk is a chance to say something to (a large subset of) the
whole conference. The thing is, lightnings should last "a MAXIMUM of
five minutes." Allowing a minute between talks, if each talk averaged
THREE minutes there would be time for roughly forty-five talks. So
please don't feel that you HAVE to speak for five minutes. Say what you
have to say, and stop.
title: Lightning Talks - Sept. 4, 2013
